(60534, 61827).label: process

(60534, 61827).name: subsurface
(60534, 61827).label: location
(60534, 61827).description: The region below the Earth's surface, including soil, sediment, and rock

(60534, 61827).name: microbial communities
(60534, 61827).label: variable

(60534, 61827).name: photosynthesis
(60534, 61827).label: process
(60534, 61827).description: The process by which plants, algae, and some bacteria convert light energy from the sun into chemical energy

(60534, 61827).name: microbial ecosystems
(60534, 61827).label: variable
(60534, 61827).description: Communities of microorganisms that interact with each other and their environment, and can be affected by factors such as nitrogen availability

(60534, 61827).name: hydrogen
(60534, 61827).label: variable
